import { Component} from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-user-info', templateUrl: './user-info.component.html', styleUrls: ['./user-info.component.scss'], }) export class PostComponent { img = 'https://blogs.nvidia.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/01/creators-collab-hero-image-kv-v2-1280x720.jpg' }
